sys_remote_update_set.description:
From: "Longsjo, Jason" <jmlongsjo@verisk.com> Date: Wednesday, June 21, 2017 at 1:43 PM To: "Vora, Hardik" <hjvora@verisk.com> Subject: Re: After Hours Report
Also add an OR condition - caller_id.u_intraoffice_location = AIR Worldwide
From: "Vora, Hardik" <hjvora@verisk.com> Date: Wednesday, June 21, 2017 at 3:37 PM To: "Longsjo, Jason" <jmlongsjo@verisk.com> Subject: Re: After Hours Report
Also assigned to which groups to report on. Should the incident be resolved by this group only or also include incident which passed this group in its lifecycle and resolved by someone else.
Hardik Vora | Servicenow Admin/Developer Verisk Analytics - Information Technology Phone: +1.801.932.8254 | Mobile: +1.248.778.6008
From: "Vora, Hardik" <hjvora@verisk.com> Date: Wednesday, June 21, 2017 at 1:35 PM To: "Longsjo, Jason" <jmlongsjo@verisk.com> Subject: Re: After Hours Report
I presume this is incident creation time .. right?
Hardik Vora | Servicenow Admin/Developer Verisk Analytics - Information Technology Phone: +1.801.932.8254 | Mobile: +1.248.778.6008
From: "Longsjo, Jason" <jmlongsjo@verisk.com> Date: Wednesday, June 21, 2017 at 1:32 PM To: "Vora, Hardik" <hjvora@verisk.com> Subject: Fwd: After Hours Report
Do you have time to look at this while I am helping John with requests?
---------- Forwarded message ---------- From: "Flynn, John" <jpflynn@AIR-WORLDWIDE.COM> Date: Wed, Jun 21, 2017 at 3:31 PM -0400 Subject: After Hours Report To: "Longsjo, Jason" <jmlongsjo@verisk.com>
Jason,
As we discussed, here is the information we are looking for a report on if possible.
Incidents that meet either requirement within the last 365 days: Mon-Fri: After 6:00PM or before 8:30AM Saturday and Sunday: any time
Let me know if you have any questions.
sys_remote_update_set.name: HV - Create AIR Off Business Hours Incident Report
